title: New: Weaves – Motorcycle
content:
weave

a form of hair extensions.

often used by black women, and celebrites. it’s woven, or glued, into the hair from the track. if done rite, it comes out cute. it may even look real, if its done real good.

Nahoje: ooh Taquasha, yo weave is mad cute.
Taquasha: wat chu talkin bout? this ain’t no weave.i got
some cherokee indian in me.
Nahoje: girl, please. you black jus like the rest of us. you ain’t foolin nobody.

Thanks for that Nahoje, Taquasha and Urban Dictionary. Toronto’s Weaves exploded onto the scene with their debut track, Hulahoop. Now with an official release scheduled through Buzz Records, they’ve released their first proper single, the electric Motorcycle, a funky, rifftastic jam that’s delightfully playful. Damn, they’re just so much fun.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
